name: end-of-line-relative-line-numbers
displayName: End of Line Relative Line Numbers
description: Show Relative Line Numbers at the end of the line

configuration.title: End of Line Relative Line Numbers

color.description: The color of the relative line numbers

hide-active-line.description: Whether or not to hide the line number for the line that the cursor is on

hide-empty-lines.description: Whether or not to hide the line number for empty lines

use-absolute-active-line.description: Whether or not to display the absolute or relative line number for the line that the cursor is on

margin.description: Used to specify the margin between the end of the line and the line number (interpreted as CSS margin)

use-prefix.description: Whether or not to add text before the line number (required for all 'prefix-*' settings to be active)

prefix-default.description: The default text to add before the line number

prefix-above.description: The text to add before the line number, for lines above the cursor (overrides 'prefix-default')

prefix-below.description: The text to add before the line number, for lines below the cursor (overrides 'prefix-default')

prefix-current.description: The text to add before the line number, for the line of the cursor (overrides 'prefix-default')

use-suffix.description: Whether or not to add text after the line number (required for all 'suffix-*' settings to be active)

suffix-default.description: The default text to add after the line number

suffix-above.description: The text to add after the line number, for lines above the cursor (overrides 'suffix-default')

suffix-below.description: The text to add after the line number, for lines below the cursor (overrides 'suffix-default')

suffix-current.description: The text to add after the line number, for the line of the cursor (overrides 'suffix-default')
